confirmUse.title: Confirm the card is used
confirmUse.text: A gift card is marked as 'Used' when the recipient has redeemed it. However, if necessary, it can be changed back to 'Valid' later.

confirmRevalidate.title: Confirm the card is valid
confirmRevalidate.text: When you change a gift card back to 'Valid', it becomes usable again for the recipient. This action allows the card to be reactivated for future use.

confirmDelete.title: Confirm deletion
confirmDelete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this gift card? This action cannot be undone
